short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the floor area of properties on ESPC.com when viewing search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're like me, floor area is one of the most important details to consider when looking at property! ESPC is great in that it displays floor area on a property's page, but unfortunately not on search results. This basic extension adds the floor area to search results, so you can easily compare across many properties at once. This shows up next to the icons showing how many rooms a property has.

The extension runs locally in your browser by checking the page of each individual property.

View the source here: https://github.com/DM-Francis/espc-floor-area
If you find any bugs, please file an issue!

The extension icon is provided by BomSymbols - Flaticon https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/ui-design
